content: SPN 6-22 RN Cordless nibbler High-capacity cordless nibbler for cutting metal profiles with more speed and minimal distortion (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Specialty power tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate versatility – high cutting capacity, interchangeable heads (available separately) and adjustable speed so you can cut flat, corrugated, trapezoidal and profiled metal sheet using the same nibbler Safer metalwork – cordless nibblers give professional sheet metal contractors a spark-free, low-vibration solution for precise, fast cuts through metal profiles Faster freeform metal cutting – 360° head rotation for near-instant change of cutting direction and better access for cutting and notching in hard-to-reach places Agile handling – toolless head change with slim, ergonomic grip, balanced body and lock-on switch deliver more precision and comfort when cutting sheet metal all day On the Nuron battery platform – cordless metalworking tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, energy-saving cutting heads and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Cutting C, L, U profiles up to 3-3/8 depth (SPN RN profile nibbler cutting head included) Freeform cutting in stainless steel up to 16 Ga Freeform cutting in mild and galvanized sheet metal up to 14 Ga ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material type: C.L.U. profile, Corrugated sheet, Flat sheet, Trapezoidal sheet Rated voltage: 21.6 V Tool body weight: 4.4 lb. Technical Data | Material type | C.L.U. profile, Corrugated sheet, Flat sheet, Trapezoidal sheet | Rated voltage | 21.6 V | Tool body weight | 4.4 lb | Triaxial vibration value for cutting sheet metal (ah,M) | 14.6 m/s² | 1 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 97 dB (A) | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2316430 - Nibbler SPN 6-22 RN - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SPN 6-22 RN Nibbler
